message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its worth to me.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $15,000?
